Class HandlerFactory

java.lang.Object
com.gr15.pacman.controller.HandlerFactory
public final class HandlerFactory extends Object
Utility class for creating event handlers used in JavaFX applications. This class provides factory methods to simplify the creation of action and key event handlers. All methods are static and this class cannot be instantiated.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.event.ActionEvent>
    createHandler(Runnable action)
    Creates an EventHandler for ActionEvent that simply runs the given action.
    static <T> javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.event.ActionEvent>
    createHandler(Supplier<T> inputSupplier, Consumer<T> action)
    Creates an EventHandler for ActionEvent that uses a supplier to get input, and then passes it to a Consumer action.
    static javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent>
    createKeyHandler(Map<javafx.scene.input.KeyCode, Runnable> actions)
    Creates an EventHandler for KeyEvent that looks up a Runnable from the provided map based on the pressed KeyCode, and runs it if found.
    static javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent>
    createKeyHandler(javafx.scene.input.KeyCode matchKey, Runnable action)
    Creates an EventHandler for KeyEvent that triggers the given action only when the specified KeyCode is pressed.
    static <T> javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent>
    createKeyHandler(javafx.scene.input.KeyCode matchKey, Supplier<T> inputSupplier, Consumer<T> action)
    Creates an EventHandler for KeyEvent that uses a supplier to get input, and passes it to a consumer action only when the specified KeyCode is pressed.

  • Method Details

    • createHandler

      public static javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.event.ActionEvent> createHandler(Runnable action)
      Creates an EventHandler for ActionEvent that simply runs the given action.
      Parameters:
      action - the action to run when the event is triggered
      Returns:
      the event handler

    • createHandler

      public static <T> javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.event.ActionEvent> createHandler(Supplier<T> inputSupplier, Consumer<T> action)
      Creates an EventHandler for ActionEvent that uses a supplier to get input, and then passes it to a Consumer action.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of input supplied
      Parameters:
      inputSupplier - the supplier that provides input when the event occurs
      action - the consumer that performs an action using the input
      Returns:
      the event handler

    • createKeyHandler

      public static javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent> createKeyHandler(javafx.scene.input.KeyCode matchKey, Runnable action)
      Creates an EventHandler for KeyEvent that triggers the given action only when the specified KeyCode is pressed.
      Parameters:
      matchKey - the key code to match
      action - the action to run when the key is pressed
      Returns:
      the key event handler

    • createKeyHandler

      public static <T> javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent> createKeyHandler(javafx.scene.input.KeyCode matchKey, Supplier<T> inputSupplier, Consumer<T> action)
      Creates an EventHandler for KeyEvent that uses a supplier to get input, and passes it to a consumer action only when the specified KeyCode is pressed.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of input supplied
      Parameters:
      matchKey - the key code to match
      inputSupplier - the supplier that provides input when the event occurs
      action - the consumer that performs an action using the input
      Returns:
      the key event handler

    • createKeyHandler

      public static javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent> createKeyHandler(Map<javafx.scene.input.KeyCode, Runnable> actions)
      Creates an EventHandler for KeyEvent that looks up a Runnable from the provided map based on the pressed KeyCode, and runs it if found.
      Parameters:
      actions - a map of key codes to runnable actions
      Returns:
      the key event handler
